name: Company Name
description: The official name of the company or organization offering the job position.

name: Job Title
description: The title of the job position, indicating the role or responsibility within the organization.

name: Salary
description: The monthly compensation, in euros, that the employee will receive for their work.

name: Travel Time
description: The estimated time, in negative minutes, it takes for an employee to travel from home to the workplace.

name: Skill Fit
description: A qualitative measure indicating how well an applicant's skills align with the job requirements. It is categorized as 'Poor', 'Average', or 'Excellent'.

name: Number Of Holidays
description: The total number of paid holidays that an employee is entitled to in a year.

name: Company Prestige
description: A qualitative assessment of the company's reputation and standing in the industry, categorized as 'Low', 'Medium', or 'High'.

name: Benefits
description: A qualitative measure of the additional perks and advantages provided to the employee, rated as 'Poor', 'Fair', 'Good', 'Very Good', or 'Excellent'.
